entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
